idea-plugin.name: Topias
idea-plugin.description: Topias is a plugin that helps to visualize frequency of methods changes in Java projects based on their Git histories. This way it can help developers to find methods that are changed suspiciously often, which could be caused by technical (some hardcoded parameters should be moved to a configuration file), architectural (this piece of code performs more than one task and should be split into several entities), or even external (a particular business rule changing too often) issues.
